gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 111, Pistons 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeated the Pistons, 111-99. Franz Wagner recorded a season-high 38 points to go along with three rebounds and two assists for the Magic, Paolo Banchero added 20 points, six rebounds, and seven assists in the victory. Cade Cunningham tallied 18 points, seven assists, and five rebounds for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Magic improve to 27-23, while the Pistons fall to 6-43.
